title: Frost, for the Clan
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a red 〈Frieza : Br〉 card : Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 mono-red Extra Card among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
If your Leader Card is a red 〈Frieza : Br〉 card : Add up to 2 mono-red Extra Cards from your Drop Area to your hand.

title: Jiren, Legend of Universe 11
energy_text: X()
skills_text:
When your opponent plays a Battle Card or Unison Card, you may choose that card and it gets -10000 power for the turn. If you do, negate this skill for the turn.
This card gains for the turn.
Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards, ignoring , and it gets -25000 power for the turn.

title: Son Goku, Resolve Renewed
skills_text:
Negate the attack and play this card.
If you have 3 or more energy, reduce the energy cost of this card in your deck and hand by 2.
, if your Leader Card is a 〈Vegito〉 card and you add 1 card from your life to your hand : Play this card from your hand.

title: Vegeta, Resolve Renewed
skills_text:
If the Battle Card being played has 15000 power or less, it is placed in its owner's Drop Area instead of being played, then play this card.
If you have 3 or more energy, reduce the energy cost of this card in your deck and hand by 2.
, if your Leader Card is a 〈Vegito〉 card and you add 1 card from your life to your hand : Play this card from your hand.

title: Vegito, Resolve Combined
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a red 〈Vegito〉 card and you draw 2 cards : 〈Son Goku〉 and 〈Vegeta〉.
: Play up to 1 〈Vegito〉 card with an energy cost of 7 or less from your deck on top of this card, then shuffle your deck.
: Choose up to 1 〈Vegito〉 card with an energy cost of 10 or less in your hand and play it on top of this card.

title: Frieza, Irate Emperor
energy_text: 7()
skills_text:
, if there are 5 or more red Extra Cards in your Drop Area : Play this card from your hand.
If your Leader Card is a red 《Frieza's Army》 card and there are 2 or more mono-red Extra Cards in your Drop Area : When this card is used in a combo, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the turn.

title: Planet Vegeta's Final Moments
skills_text: Negate the attack, then if your Leader Card is a red 〈Frieza : Br〉 card, choose all of you and your opponent's Leader Cards and Battle Cards and they get -10000 power for the turn.

title: Janemba, Wicked Agent of Destruction
skills_text:
You and your opponent draw 1 card, then your opponent places the top card of their deck in their Drop Area.
This card gains for the turn.
If your opponent has 15 or less cards in their deck : This card gets +15000 power and for the turn.

title: Turles, Chaotic Agent of Destruction
skills_text: When this card attacks, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 card with {Agent of Destruction} in its card name among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

title: Janemba, Raging Incarnation of Evil
energy_text: 4()
skills_text: When this card is played, activate this skill. At the start of your opponent's next turn, switch up to 3 of your mono-blue energy to Active Mode, then draw 1 card.

title: Combo Attack Janemba
skills_text: Choose 1 《Evil Incarnate》 card or 《Demon》 card in your Battle Area other than copies of this card and return it to its owner's hand : Play this card from your hand, then add up to 2 cards from your life to your hand; you can't play copies of this card for the turn.

title: Restoration
skills_text: Negate the attack, then if your Leader Card is a blue 〈Android 21〉 card and you have a Blue/Green multicolor card in your energy, choose up to 1 〈Android 16〉 card with an energy cost of 2 or less in your hand and play it.

title: Vegeta, Resolute Agent of Destruction
energy_text: X()
skills_text:
Choose 1 card in your hand and discard it : When this card is played, choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards, ignoring , and KO them.
This card gets +5000 power for the turn.
If your Leader Card is an 《Evil Wizard》 card or all of your energy is mono-green : Choose 3 cards in your opponent's hand and discard them.

title: Gokule, the Legendary Fusion Warrior
skills_text:
When this card is played, add up to 1 green card with an energy cost of 6 or less and a skill from your deck to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
, place this card in its owner's Drop Area, then choose 1 card in your hand with a skill and reveal it : For each character name required for the revealed card's skill, add up to 1 card with a matching character name and energy cost between 3 and 7 from your deck to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

title: Son Goten & Trunks, Faultless Youth
skills_text:
, if your Leader Card is a green 〈Gotenks〉 card and you place 1 card from your life in your Drop Area: Play this card from your hand.

If your Leader Card is a green 〈Gotenks〉 card and you return this card to its owner's hand : Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 green 〈Gotenks〉 card or 1 green Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

title: Gotenks, the Grim Reaper of Justice
energy_text: 6()
skills_text:
: 〈Son Goten〉 and 〈Trunks : Youth〉.
If your Leader Card is a green 〈Gotenks〉 card : When this card is played, draw 2 cards, then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and KO it.
When this card is removed from your Battle Area by an opponent's skill or KO'd, add up to 1 〈Son Goten〉 card and up to 1 〈Trunks : Youth〉 card from your Drop Area to your hand.

title: Cheelai & Lemo, the Bandits
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a green 《Shenron》 card : When this card is played, choose one?
・ Place up to 2 cards with skills from your deck in your Drop Area, shuffle your deck, then draw 1 card.
・ Add up to 1 green 《Desire》 card from your Drop Area to your hand.

title: Broly, Invincible Agent of Destruction
energy_text: 3()
skills_text:
, discard this card from your hand : Add 1 card with {Agent of Destruction} in its card name from your Drop Area to your hand.
When this card is played, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 5 or less, KO it, then look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, add 1 card among them to your hand, then place the remaining cards in your Drop Area.

title: Lord Slug, Mighty Agent of Destruction
skills_text: When your opponent activates a skill, they choose 2 cards in their hand and discard them.

title: Android 13, Exterminating Agent of Destruction
skills_text:
If your Leader Card has {Agent of Destruction} in its card name : If the Battle Card being played has an energy cost of 3 or less, it is placed in its owner's Drop Area instead of being played, play this card, then your opponent chooses 1 card in their hand and discards it.
When this card is played, shuffle up to a total of 2 《Evil Wizard》 cards and/or cards with {Agent of Destruction} in their card names from your Drop Area into your deck.

title: Allied Reinforcements
skills_text:
This card gains 《Desire》 in all areas.
If your Leader Card is a 〈Cheelai : Br/Lemo : Br〉 card and you choose 1 card in your hand and discard it : Choose one?
・ If you have no cards in your Battle Area, play up to 1 green 〈Broly : Br〉 card with an energy cost of 4 from your deck and up to 1 green 〈Cheelai : Br〉 or 〈Lemo : Br〉 card from your deck, then shuffle your deck.
・ Play up to 1 green 〈Cheelai : Br〉 or 〈Lemo : Br〉 card from your Drop Area.

title: King Vegeta, Royal Pride
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is yellow : Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 mono-yellow 《Great Ape》 card among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
Play up to 2 mono-yellow 《Great Ape》 cards with different names and energy costs of 4 or less from your deck, then shuffle your deck.

title: Great Ape Bardock, Might of the Resistance
skills_text:
You can only play mono-yellow 《Saiyan》 cards.
If your Leader Card is yellow : At the end of a battle where this card is used in a combo from your hand, play this card.

title: Boujack, Galactic Disruptor
skills_text:
If you have 2 or more 《Boujack Brigade》 cards in play in your Battle Area : Play this card from your hand, then you can't play copies of this card for the turn.
If your Leader Card is a yellow 〈Boujack〉 card on its front side, you have 2 or more energy, and you discard this card from your hand : Flip your Leader Card to its back side, then draw 2 cards.

title: Violent Rush Zangya
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a 《Boujack Brigade》 card : When this card is used in a combo from your Battle Area, it gets +5000 combo power for the battle.
At the end of a battle where this card is used in a combo from your Battle Area, return this card to its owner's hand.

title: Garlic Jr., Immortal Agent of Destruction
skills_text:
Negate the attack and play this card.
When this card is played, play up to 1 《Agent of Destruction》 card with an energy cost of 2 other than copies of this card from your deck with its skills negated for the turn, then shuffle your deck.

title: The Agents of Destruction Strike Back
skills_text:
This card gains 《Agent of Destruction》 in all areas.
Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 2 cards with {Agent of Destruction} in their card names among them to your hand, then place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order and you can't activate copies of this card for the turn. If you added cards to your hand, add up to 1 card from your life to your hand.

title: Full Moon
skills_text:
If you have a 《Great Ape》 card in play in your Battle Area, you can activate this card's skill from your hand without paying its energy cost.
Choose up to 1 of your mono-yellow cards and it gets +10000 power for the battle; if it's your opponent's turn, choose up to 1 《Great Ape》 card in your Battle Area and switch it to Active Mode.

title: Babidi, Leader of the Agents of Destruction
skills_text:
Treat 《Agent of Destruction》 cards in your hand as if they had no specified cost.
When this card attacks, add up to 1 card from your life to your hand, then look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 card with {Agent of Destruction} in its card name to your hand, then shuffle your deck.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 1 card, then switch up to 1 of your energy to Active Mode and flip this card over.
title_back: Majin Buu, Leader of the Agents of Destruction
skills_back_text:
Treat 《Agent of Destruction》 cards in your hand as if they had no specified cost.
Choose 1 《Agent of Destruction》 card with an energy cost of 2 or less in your hand and play it.
: Choose 1 Unison Card with {Agent of Destruction} in its card name in your hand and play it with 3 markers on it.

title: Son Goku Jr. & Vegeta Jr., Saiyan Scions
skills_text:
Choose this card and all of your skill-less Battle Cards and they get +5000 power for the turn.
Play up to 2 skill-less Battle Cards with energy costs of 1 from your deck or Drop Area, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.
Shuffle 2 skill-less Battle Cards from your Drop Area into your deck : Draw 2 cards.

title: Son Goku & Android 8, Bonds of Battle
skills_text:
This card and skill-less Battle Cards in your Battle Area can be used in combos in Rest Mode.
If your Leader Card is a black 〈Son Goku : Childhood〉 card : When this card is played, add up to 1 card from your life to your hand, then play up to 2 skill-less Battle Cards with 10000 power from your deck or Drop Area; shuffle your deck if you looked through it.

title: Hatchhyack, Vengeful Agent of Destruction
skills_text:
, discard this card from your hand : Play up to 1 〈Evil Wizard Babidi〉 card with an energy cost of 1 from your deck or Drop Area, then shuffle your deck if you looked through it.
When this card is played, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 4 or less, send it to its owner's Warp, then place up to 3 Battle Cards from your opponent's Drop Area at the bottom of their deck in any order.

title: Hatchhyack, Mad With Hate
skills_text:
〈Hatchhyack〉 with an energy cost of 8.
When a card evolves into this card, switch this card to Active Mode.
When your opponent activates a skill, they choose 1 card in their hand and send it to their Warp.

title: Max Power Kamehameha
skills_text:
Negate the attack. You may send 4 cards from your Drop Area to your Warp. If you do, return this card from your Drop Area to your hand, and you can't activate copies of this card for the turn.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost greater than their current energy and send it to its owner's Warp.

title: Violent Rush Boujack
energy_text: 7()
skills_text: When this card activates its skill, draw 1 card.

title: Super 17, Hell's Ultimate Weapon
skills_text:
If your Leader Card is a blue 〈Android 21〉 card, negate this card's skill in all areas.
: Play this card from your Energy Area, then play up to 3 《Android》 cards with energy costs of 5 or less from your Energy Area.
